Row.Text: Fish Herder
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Fish.
Each source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of Fish nearby.

A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Crab.
